data.name: By Hanson Ye
data.value: 作者：叶海生，项目运营总监

data.name: Clean clothes offer a better chance of finding a job.
data.value: 干净的衣服让他更容易找到工作

data.name: During the national holiday last month, several of our graduates returned to the Renewal Center because they consider it their home. Zhou Yushuai told us he has made some good friends at his factory job in Ningbo. One of our other guys reminded us of the importance of family, saying, “Every holiday, it’s loved ones I miss the most.”
data.value: 在上个月的国庆假期期间，多名日新中心培训计划的毕业生回到了中心，因为这里仍是他们的家。周余帅告诉我们，他在宁波工厂的新工作中已经结识了多位好友。正像他们中的另一位强调的，“每逢佳节倍思亲！”而我们就是相互间最重要的亲人。

data.name: I first want to say a very big “thank you” for your support during the Covid-19 crisis – and you might have been able to send a gift to be doubled during our recent matching grant campaign. The pandemic is far from over, and millions of people are suffering an economic impact, which makes me all the more grateful. Your help has never been so important.
data.value: 首先，我要衷心向您说一声感谢，谢谢您在新冠疫情期间给予我们的支持，以及您在我们最近的等额资助金活动中做出的捐赠。然而，新冠危机还远未结束，数百万人都受到了疫情造成的经济影响。在这样的艰难环境下，我更要向您表示感谢，您此时的帮助对我们而言更加重要。

data.name: I hope that you and your loved ones are safe and well at this time, and thank you again for your kindness during this global crisis.
data.value: 我希望您和您所爱的人们都保持安全、健康，并感谢您在这一全球性危机中持续给予我们的帮助。

data.name: I see the lasting impact of your kindness
data.value: 您的善举带来的长久影响

data.name: Lockdown took their jobs and homes, but your help gives them hope
data.value: 防控措施使他们失去了工作与住所，但您的帮助给了他们希望

data.name: On the surface, life is returning to normal here in China, but your support is providing essential help to those who are still struggling to survive in the wake of the recent lockdown. Temporary jobs in Shanghai are extremely hard to find, and new health protocols mean people can no longer use the hand basin in a public lavatory to bathe or wash their clothes. The result is a spike in demand for the services here at Renewal that are funded by your kind gifts.
data.value: 表面上，疫情后中国人的生活正逐渐恢复正常，但之前的封锁措施使无家可归者们的生活更加困难，而您的支持可以为他们提供最重要的帮助。在上海，临时工作非常难找，而新的防疫措施禁止在公共卫生间洗澡和洗衣服。因此，对日新中心提供的这些服务的需求猛增，而这离不开您的慷慨捐赠。

data.name: The good news for Zhang and many others is your amazing support. Your gifts are a lifeline to people who have no other help to meet their basic needs, so we and the people you reach every day are deeply grateful for you and the gifts you give. We are also very aware how much we depend on your financial generosity – and donations like clean, wearable, used or new clothes – to give people a better chance of finding work and making a new start in life.
data.value: 您的支持对张明和许多其他人而言就是最好的消息。对于那些生活的基本需求都无法得到满足的人们而言，您的捐赠能够拯救他们的生命，我们和这些受助者们都对您怀有衷心的感激。我们也清楚地知道，您慷慨的资金捐赠，以及捐助的各种干净、实用的衣物，是我们得以帮助无家可归者找到工作，进而开始新生的最大依靠。

data.name: Walking around in dirty clothes makes you feel inferior.
data.value: 穿着脏衣服会让人感觉低人一等

data.name: Your gifts reach the homeless hit by Covid-19
data.value: 您的捐赠能够帮助受新冠影响的无家可归者

data.name: Zhang Ming has a larger frame than most, so if you are wondering as some of our supporters do whether we can use large size clothes, the answer is “Yes!” In fact, whatever help you can send in this time of continued crisis for homeless people will make a huge difference – and be hugely appreciated.
data.value: 张明的体型比大多数人都要高大，所以如果您和我们的一些支持者一样想知道我们是否需要大码服装，我们的回答是肯定的！事实上，在这个持续性的危机时期，无论您提供的任何帮助都能为无家可归者的生活带来巨大影响，我们对此都感激不尽。

data.name: Zhang Ming is grateful just for access to a washing machine, showers and our clothing exchange. “Walking around in dirty clothes makes you feel inferior,” he says. “Your confidence hits bottom and it’s impossible to find job.” It all makes life on the streets even harder than before. “For me, the pandemic has meant that I can’t make a living or afford to pay rent, so sleeping on the streets is my only option right now.”
data.value: 张明对我们提供的淋浴和换洗衣物的服务特别感激。他表示：“穿着脏衣服走在街头让我感觉低人一等，没有自信，根本无法找到工作。”这让无家可归的街头生活比过去更加困难。“疫情使我没了工作，无法支付房租，露宿街头成了我现在唯一的选择。”
